title.rendered: Part Time Medical Receptionist | Broken Arrow, OK

content.rendered:
Part Time Medical Receptionist | Broken Arrow, Oklahoma
  • Part-Time Monday-Friday 3-8pm
  • 2+ years front office experience, medical office preferred
  • Prefer experience with Electronic Medical Records
  • Responsible for check-in and check-out, copays and appointments
  • $11+/hour
